name: Awesome Delicious Ice Cream Frozen Dessert Food Maker Free
name_original: Awesome Delicious Ice Cream Frozen Dessert Food Maker Free
description:
Who doesn't love delicious ice cream? Well you can create your own delicious treat to fit your style! This game lets you create many different treats!

[Features]
-Ice Cream Waffle Cones!
-Ice Pops
-Ice cream Sandwiches
-Sundaes!
-Snow Cones!

[Style your Treats!]
-Dozens of different flavors to try!
-Tons of unique decorations to top off your treat!
-Different cones, sticks, and much more!

Perfect game for all ages, download and play today!



*This game offers in-app purchases made with real money.
